text: Carinapex amirowlandae is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Horaiclavidae.Bouchet, P. (2015). Carinapex amirowlandae Wiedrick, 2015. In: MolluscaBase (2015). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=834132 on 2017-01-15 ==Description== The length of the shell attains 3.1 mm. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off Madagascar, the Philippines and in the Central Pacific. ==References== * Wiedrick S.G. (2015). Review of the genus Carinapex Dall, 1924 with the description of ten new species (Gastropoda: Conoidea: Horaiclavidae) from the Pacific Ocean. The Festivus. 47(1): 5–28. page(s): 6, pl. 1 figs 9-12 ==External links== * amirowlandae
title: Carinapex amirowlandae
